content: MT-B-GS AB OC Heavy-duty brace Hot-dip galvanized adjustable heavy-duty bracing and baseplate suitable for girders, concrete and steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Versatile – use it as a girder-to-girder connector, for angle braces or for fastening modular support structures to concrete and steel Compatible with powder-actuated threaded studs for steel and MT Thread Forming Bolt channel connectors – for much faster, adaptable assembly Corrosion resistance – hot-dip galvanized to help protect against moisture and chemical corrosion Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Applications Assembling and bracing modular support structures consisting of MT-70 and MT-80 girders Fastening modular support structures to concrete and steel Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 10 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Material thickness | 10 mm | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2332787 - Baseplate MT-B-GS AB OC - Package Size 8 pc
